title: Star Construct
text: Star Constructs are elegant machines made of star-metal and bound light. Created by the Starforge, they serve as its maintenance crew and security. They attack with beams of searing heat and gravity manipulation. Defeating one releases a burst of stardust that is highly prized by alchemists.
image_prompt: A construct made of constellation lines and star stuff, geometric and beautiful.
name: Star Construct
description: A Construct known as Star Construct forged from the light of dying stars.
